Description: Six fragments of a very large pottery ostracon bearing 11 lines of Greek text containing Psalms 90.1-6.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr William Yewdale Adams
Curator's comments: 2012.1001.8-11 are part of the same object. For relationship to EA 82387, see Ruffini forthcoming in JJP.
Bibliographic references: Adams 2002 / Merinarti III: The Late and Terminal Christian Phases (91, pl. 29d)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (395074) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/395074)
